event.title: 2010 census is 1,819,339, of whom 669,317 are resident in the built

data.event: The total population of the prefecture at the 2010 census is 1,819,339, of whom 669,317 are resident in the built up area, which comprises four urban districts, collectively known as 'Fuxin City'.
A majority of the annual precipitation falls in July and August alone.
